code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import LandingScreen from'./components/LandingScreen';import Navigation from'./components/Navigation';import StorySection from'./components/StorySection';import GallerySection from'./components/GallerySection';import GuideSection from'./components/GuideSection';import ConnectSection from'./components/ConnectSection';import MatrixBackground from'./components/MatrixBackground';import'./styles/App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[showLanding,setShowLanding]=useState(true);const[activeSection,setActiveSection]=useState('story');useEffect(()=>{const timer=setTimeout(()=>{setShowLanding(false);},6000);return()=>clearTimeout(timer);},[]);const handleSectionChange=section=>{setActiveSection(section);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MatrixBackground,{}),showLanding?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LandingScreen,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigation,{activeSection:activeSection,onSectionChange:handleSectionChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[activeSection==='story'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StorySection,{}),activeSection==='gallery'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GallerySection,{}),activeSection==='guide'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GuideSection,{}),activeSection==='connect'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ConnectSection,{})]})]})]});}export default App;
